message.content:
{"id": "122423", "title": "Bug 122423 - Support page range in RenderTask", "description": "Bug 122423 - Support page range in RenderTask. If a page range is specified, parse it and output the pages one after another, with a page splitter in between, similar to the runAndRenderTask function. If the page range consists of only one page number, output that specific page. Otherwise, output the whole report. Invalid page numbers should be logged, and an error message returned if necessary.", "OB": "The render task should be updated to support page ranges. For PDF format, if a page range is specified, log a message stating that page range is not supported, but still output the whole report. For HTML format, page ranges should be supported in the format of '1,2,510' + 'All'. If an invalid page number is encountered, it should be logged, and an appropriate error message should be returned.", "EB": "The render task does not currently support page ranges. This feature needs to be implemented in order to allow users to specify page ranges when rendering documents. For PDF format, if a page range is specified, a message should be logged to inform the user that page range is not supported, but the entire report will still be outputted. For HTML format, page ranges should be supported using the format '1,2,510' + 'All'. Any invalid page numbers encountered should be logged, and an error message should be returned.", "SR": "1. Update the render task to support page ranges.
2. For PDF format, log a message informing the user that page range is not supported, but still output the whole report if a page range is specified.
3. For HTML format, support page ranges in the format of '1,2,510' + 'All'.
4. Log invalid page numbers and return appropriate error messages if necessary."}

origin.input_prompt:
Your role is a senior software engineer, you are very good at analyzing and writing bug reports.
It is possible that the bug report may lack sufficient details in the OB, EB, and SR sections.  In such cases, your task is to infer the appropriate details based on the context and supplement the bug report to ensure it contains clear and complete OB/EB/SR statements.  Also, improve the wording of these statements for clarity where possible.
To facilitate this process, please provide your responses in JSON format as follows:
{"id": "", "title": "", "description": "", "OB": "", "EB": "", "SR": ""}
origin.input_content:
<BUG REPORT>
{'id': '122423', 'title': 'Bug 122423Support page range in RenderTask', 'description': 'Bug 122423Support page range in RenderTask If so, parse it and form a range and output them one after another, with a page splitter in between just like the runAndRenderTask. There can only be one page in case a page number is set. ', 'OB': 'Support page range in render task.For PDF format, simply log a message saying range is not supported if a range is specified, and still output whole report.For HTML format, support page range in the form of "1,2,510" + "All". Invalid page number should be logged, and error message is returned. ', 'EB': '', 'SR': ''}
